name: Blastershot
description:
Description

Difficult arcade space shooter with 78 player ships and many hidden challenges. Dive deep into old school space battle.

Features
  • 13 Player Ships each in 6 colour variations.
  • 9 Unique Alien Space Ships in 4 colour variations.
  • 2 Unique Alien Space Ship Bosses in 4 colour variations.
  • High score tracking
  • New boss battle every 2 minutes
Controls
  • w,s - increase, decrease speed
  • a,d -rotate your ship
  • mouse button 1 - shoot rockets
  • mouse button 2 - shoot beam
